mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_AUTHOR, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_READ_CNT ) VALUES ( #{noticeAuthor}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, now(), 0 )
INSERT INTO NOTICE_FILE ( NOTICE_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_URL ) VALUES ( #{noticeNo}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, now()) )
mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTICE_NO, n.NOTICE_AUTHOR, n.NOTICE_TITLE, n.NOTICE_CONTENT, n.NOTICE_REGDATE, n.NOTICE_READ_CNT FROM NOTICE n ORDER BY n.NOTICE_NO DESC LIMIT #{noticeLimit} OFFSET #{noticeOffset}

SELECT n.notice_no, n.notice_author, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_regdate, n.notice_read_cnt FROM NOTICE n WHERE n.NOTICE_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{noticeSearchWord} ,'%') ORDER BY n.notice_no DESC LIMIT #{noticeLimit} OFFSET #{noticeOffset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{noticeSearchWord} ,'%')
SELECT FILE_URL FROM NOTICE_FILE WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
SELECT NOTICE_NO, FILE_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_URL, REGDATE FROM NOTICE_FILE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM notice_read WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo} and notice_author = #{noticeAuthor}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_read ( notice_no, notice_author ) VALUES ( #{noticeNo}, #{noticeAuthor} )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE set NOTICE_READ_CNT = NOTICE_READ_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{noticeNo}
